text: namuth ohu upanne lankawe.

amarikanu dhanawadaya ehi goliya adhikaraye saha balapame mudunata lanwemin siti samaye ehi nayakayo hudek eksath janapada wyawasthawa thula thahawuru kara athi deshapalana ayithiwasikam pamanak samanathawa da "sathuta soyayama da” sakshath kara dima sandaha nosahena bawa piligaththoya. 1944 janawari masaye di ohu kala rajya thaththwa deshanaye di janadhipathi ruswelt mese kiya sitiye ya: "apage janathawagen yam kotasak thunen panguwak ho pahen panguwak ho dahayen panguwak ho wewa hariyata aahara nathiwa, andum nathuwa, niwasa nathiwa, anarakshithawa sitith nam apata sathutu wiya nohakiya.” "aarthika aarakshawen saha swadhinathwayen thorawa saba pudgalika nidahasak pawathiyahakke nathayi” yanna ibeta ma pahadili wu sathyayak yayi ohu pa්rakasha kaleya.

nuthana manawa ithihasagnyayin nopiliganna ithihasaya manawa ithihasaya ha thakshanaye diyunuwa pilibandawath danata poduwe iganwena mathawada niwaradi yayi piligannawun, enam minisa shishtachara lesa diyunuwannata patangena danata wasara 10,000k wath nomathi bawath, eejipthu piramida wasara 5000kata pera rodaya ho yakada pawa nothibunu, gowithanin ha welandamen jiwath wunu parani eejiththu wasiyan wisin nirmanaya karana lada bawath wishwasa karana manawa shistachara wisheshagnyayin, mema sithiyam hudek anumana matha nirmanaya karana lada eewa bawa prakashakarathi.

yatithala wyuha sanwardhana wadapiliwela ha sruju widesha aayojana mehidi iwahal kotagena thibe.me yahapath kriyadamaya samanga rate madhyagatha pihitima, soba saundarya, adwithiya sanskruthiya, ha ugath shramabalakaya yana sadhaka wishishta sarthakathwayakata manga padanu noanumanaya.indiyan sagaraye madhyagatha pihitima siyalu ratawal nauka gaman sambandha kerena athara waraya ha guwanthotupola sanwardhanaya menma nawa guwanthotupola ha waraya godanagima thulin shri lankawa sagarika ha guwan kendrayak bawata pathkara thibe.manawa pragdhanaya gana salakimedi wyapara sanwardhanaya mulikasthanayak ganna athara ee sandaha shri lankawa sathuwa aththe wishishta awasthawaki.widesha aayojana diriganwima samanga kusalatha purnathwaya ha sobawika wathkam ekwimen wyaparika wardhanaya sandaha kalapiya washayen wasi sahagatha thaththwayak himiwa thibe.me anuwa indiyawa chinaya ha sesu aasiyathika ratawal athara sancharaka pramukhathwayak himikara ganmata shri lankawata awasthawa padi atha.

ekata ee anshayanta.ee diyamanthi gal anek eewa wage lehesiyen opa damanna baha.ee diyamanthi gala opa damanna puluwan dishawa danagannata ona.harima amarayi.ekata apita tagat ekak dunne naha.anik hama ekakatama tagat ekata thamayi wada karanna ona.tagat walata wada kalahama mama muladi kiwwa wage hoda watupak araganna puluwan.kalapaya thula anek aayathana walata wada.hama pahasukamakma thibuna apita.jiwath wenna puluwan.sathutin hitiya. 1985 mayi masa 14 weni dina........

watup wadikarana lesa illamin thanathuruwalin iwathwime wruththiya samithi kriya margayak wishwawidyala aacharyawarunge sammelanaya gena thibunath wishwawidyala aacharyawaru wisin ema kriyamargaya prathikshepa kara thibe.wayambaa, kalaniya, sabaragamuwa, rajarata, agnidiga saha saundarya wani wishwawidyalawalin ha kolambaa wishwawidyalaye nithi, waidya ha widya pitawalath kisima aacharyawarayaku aswime lipi bara di nathi bawa ema wishwawidyalawala niladharihu kiyathi.nagenahira wishwawidyalaye waidya pitaye saha thrikunamalaya mandalaye kisiwakuda me wana witath lipi bara di natha.wishwawidyala aacharyawarunge samithi sammelanaye sabhapathi aacharya nirmal ranjith dewasiri mahatha prakasha kele peradeniya moratuwa, ruhuna, jayawardhanapura, yapanaya wishwawidyalawala siyayata siyayak aacharyawaru illa aswime lipi bara di athi bawayi.me wana wita aacharyawaru siyayata anuwak thanathuruwalin illa aswi athayida hethema sandahan keleya.namuth wishwawidyala upakulapathiwarun prakasha kele aacharyawarun kihipadenaku pamanak illa aswime lipi bara di athi bawayi.wishwawidyala adhyapana ha paripalana katayuthu da samanya paridi sidu kerunu bawath upakulapathiwaru sandahan kalaha.wishwawidyala aacharyawarunge samithi sammelanaya kriyathmaka kala me wruththiya kriyamargaya siyayata 80 kin asarthaka bawa usas adhyapana amathyanshaye jyeshta niladhariyek pawasiya..
